<a id="XRFaceTracker"></a>

# XRFaceTracker

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [XRTracker](XRTracker.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A tracked face.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An instance of this object represents a tracked face and its corresponding blend shapes. The blend shapes come from the [Unified Expressions](https://docs.vrcft.io/docs/tutorial-avatars/tutorial-avatars-extras/unified-blendshapes) standard, and contain extended details and visuals for each blend shape. Additionally the [Tracking Standard Comparison](https://docs.vrcft.io/docs/tutorial-avatars/tutorial-avatars-extras/compatibility/overview) page documents the relationship between Unified Expressions and other standards.

As face trackers are turned on they are registered with the [XRServer](XRServer.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XR documentation index](../tutorials/xr/index.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="XRFaceTracker_property_blend_shapes"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) **blend_shapes** = `PackedFloat32Array()` [ðŸ”—](#XRFaceTracker_property_blend_shapes)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_blend_shapes**\ (\ value\: [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md)\ )
- [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) **get_blend_shapes**\ (\ )

The array of face blend shape weights with indices corresponding to the [BlendShapeEntry](XRFaceTracker.md#enum_XRFaceTracker_BlendShapeEntry) enum.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="XRFaceTracker_method_get_blend_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_blend_shape**\ (\ blend_shape\: [BlendShapeEntry](XRFaceTracker.md#enum_XRFaceTracker_BlendShapeEntry)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#XRFaceTracker_method_get_blend_shape)

Returns the requested face blend shape weight.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="XRFaceTracker_method_set_blend_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_blend_shape**\ (\ blend_shape\: [BlendShapeEntry](XRFaceTracker.md#enum_XRFaceTracker_BlendShapeEntry), weight\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#XRFaceTracker_method_set_blend_shape)

Sets a face blend shape weight.
